nodes.summary: Day/night settings for custom lock screen sounds (e.g., disable during sleep), timed 'Do Not Disturb' modes, full customization of welcoming screen. | Consolidated: Timed/Scheduled Audio & DND Modes: Users want automated silence overrides for alarms/sleep without manual toggles.

GPS-based prompt when turning on speaker during a call to warn if in confined public space (e.g., airport). | Consolidated: Context-Aware Call Etiquette Alerts: Limited overlap; one post suggests GPS-triggered historical info during drives, not calls.

Integrate MacBook-style camera filters directly into iPhone for TikTok hype. | Consolidated: Built-in Camera Effects/Filters: Calls for native filters to boost social media sharing, avoiding third-party apps.

Fix WiFi calling bugs, improve Siri for regional accents (e.g., Appalachian), resolve keyboard glitches, replace text tones with single beep during calls, ensure reliability. | Consolidated: Siri/Dictation Fixes: Widespread frustration with accent recognition and voice-to-text errors. Call/Keyboard Bugs: Mute tones during calls and glitchy input.
Enable tap-to-focus on Camera Control button for easier subject selection. | Consolidated: Camera Control Enhancements: Tap gestures for focus/zoom to reduce hassle vs. holding/pressing.

Customize Camera Control actions based on active app (e.g., volume for calls, zoom/brightness via pressure/slides, scrolling in Safari). | Consolidated: App-Specific Button Remapping: Dynamic controls for volume, scrolling, or brightness per app context.

Add 4-column layout option for connectivity controls in Control Center to fit more actions, or standalone toggles. | Consolidated: Control Center Layout/Customization: Expandable grids or multi-page fixes for cluttered toggles.
Separate system and app audio channels; allow app audio to play when phone is muted. | Consolidated: Audio Channel Separation: Independent app vs. system sounds, especially for muted playback.

'Updates Feed' via swipe-up on Home Screen for personalized info; circle gesture on Home Bar for Apple Intelligence queries. | Consolidated: AI-Driven Home Interactions: Swipe feeds for contextual updates; on-screen circling for instant queries.

Hardware camera upgrades: better ultra-wide with IBIS, closer macro focus on 1x, reduced night flares, C2PA verification (avoid megapixels/zoom/AI). | Consolidated: Sensor/Optics Improvements: IBIS, macro focus, flare reduction over gimmicks.

Fix core iOS issues: Photos app glitches, intuitive Control Center, touchscreen lag, search bar functionality (prioritize basics over animations). | Consolidated: Photos App Overhaul: Revert cluttered UI, improve navigation/search (highest redundancy). General UI Bugs: Touch lag, Control Center intuitiveness.
